cc.factorie.variable

DiscreteVariable

abstract class DiscreteVariable extends MutableDiscreteVar

A concrete single discrete variable whose value can be changed.

Linear Supertypes
MutableDiscreteVar, IterableSettings, MutableVar, DiscreteVar, VarWithDomain, VectorVar, TensorVar, Var, AnyRef, Any
Known Subclasses
